valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: High Scotland 1040 dissipating. Low Trafalgar 1006 losing its identity

Wind
Northwesterly veering northerly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 later in east.
Sea state
Rough, becoming very rough later in north and east.
Weather
Showers, turning wintry.
Visibility
Good, occasionally moderate.
